name: Stormeye
description:
When your side switches characters and at the End Phase: Deal Anemo DMG. Your opponent switches to the previous character.
Usage(s): 3

After your character or Summon triggers a Swirl reaction: Convert the Elemental Type of this card and change its DMG dealt to the Swirled Element. (Can only be converted once before leaving the field)
descriptionraw:
<color=#FFFFFFFF>When your side switches characters and at the End Phase:</color> Deal $[K105]. Your opponent switches to the previous character.
<color=#FFFFFFFF>$[K3]: 3</color>

<color=#FFFFFFFF>After your character or Summon triggers a Swirl reaction:</color> Convert the Elemental Type of this card and change its DMG dealt to the Swirled Element. (Can only be converted once before leaving the field)
descriptionreplaced:
<color=#FFFFFFFF>When your side switches characters and at the End Phase:</color> Deal {SPRITE_PRESET#2105}<color=#80FFD7FF>Anemo DMG</color>. Your opponent switches to the previous character.
<color=#FFFFFFFF><color=#FFFFFFFF>Usage(s)</color>: 3</color>

<color=#FFFFFFFF>After your character or Summon triggers a Swirl reaction:</color> Convert the Elemental Type of this card and change its DMG dealt to the Swirled Element. (Can only be converted once before leaving the field)
